description:
http://anidb.net/ch26330 [Lemon], http://anidb.net/ch26328 [Marron] and Melon are identical triplets who work for the http://anidb.net/ch26331 [Physical Health Department] of Hanaukyou. Because of their questionable imaginations, this usually consists of them attempting various lewd acts on http://anidb.net/ch3381 [Tarou] around and during bedtime, which he nonetheless seems to avoid mostly.
(The equivalents in the http://anidb.net/a1555 [La Verit√© remake] of http://anidb.net/ch3387 [Ichigo], http://anidb.net/ch3389 [Ringo] and http://anidb.net/ch3388 [Sango] from the http://anidb.net/a54 [original TV series].)
name: Melon
